name: BNAT Router
author: bannedit <bannedit@metasploit.com>
Jonathan Claudius
description:
This module will properly route BNAT traffic and allow for connections to be
        established to machines on ports which might not otherwise be accessible.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: OUTINF
options.description: The external interface connected to the internet

options.name: ININF
options.description: The internal interface connected to the network

options.name: CLIENTIP
options.description: The ip of the client behing the BNAT router

options.name: SERVERIP
options.description: The ip of the server you are targeting

options.name: BNATIP
options.description: The ip of the bnat response you are getting
